fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: The policy areas in which IVSA operates are: Animal health, Development, Education, Employment and social affairs, Environment, Fisheries and aquaculture, Food safety, Information Society, Livestock, Medical profession, Public health, Science, Youth. IVSA focuses on these areas by raising awareness for problems in those fields and writing policy papers and position statements. Thereby IVSA is member of the Animal Health Advisory Committee (the working group of the Advisory Group on the food chain and animal and plant health) and will give input on related subjects when asked for. At last, IVSA works on diverse long and short term projects in the above mentioned areas, with the leadership of our standing committees and with help of our local and national Member Organizations (MOs).
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Advisory Group on the Food Chain and Animal and Plant Health#E00860#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=860#Not a member#C#Animal Health Advisory Committee
goals__remit: The mission of IVSA is to benefit the animals and people of the world by harnessing the potential and dedication of veterinary students by promoting the international application of veterinary skills, education and knowledge. The way in which this is achieved, is by arranging annual meetings (congresses and symposia), running permanent projects, facilitating exchanges and publishing newsletters. IVSA has several international committees and working groups that work on the permanent projects, but also on new activities regarding one health, animal welfare, veterinary education and mental wellness in the veterinary profession.
